oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Francis Craig's Serenade - 1946-06-16 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC syndication Francis Craig's Serenade, originating at WSM, Nashville, TN. Originally broadcast June 16, 1946, part 1. Featuring an orchestra led by Francis Craig, with vocalist Bob Lamb, and announcer Jud Collins. Held at Marine Corps Air Station Cherry Point, NC.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Francis Craig and his Orchestra; Bob Lamb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Red Rose) -- Opening statement (Jud Collins) -- (I'm) Confessin' (That I Love You) (Francis Craig and his Orchestra) -- Jud Collins introduces Bob Lamb -- I Don't Know Enough About You (Bob Lamb vocals, Francis Craig and his Orchestra) -- Jud Collins talks -- Coax Me A Little Bit (Francis Craig and his Orchestra) -- Jud Collins talks -- The Mission Of The Rose (Bob Lamb vocals, Francis Craig and his Orchestra) -- Jud Collins talks -- Wherever There's Me There's You / I Don't Know Why / To Each His Own (medley) (Francis Craig and his Orchestra) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Marine Corps Air Station Cherry Point (N.C.); Francis Craig's Serenade (Radio program); Collins, Jud; Craig, Francis, 1900-1966; Lamb, Bob (Vocalist)
